name: manicotti
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
large tubes of pasta, usually filled with cheese or meat and covered with a tomato sauce: I had the spinach and cheese manicotti, which was delicious. We make the manicottis from this recipe, but we use our own sauce. Arrange the manicotti in rows and top with the sauce.
More examplesFewer examplesNext lay the stuffed manicotti in the sauce and pour the remaining sauce all over it. I used shop-bought manicotti pasta shells and stuffed them with a ricotta mixture.
